title: Totora
creator_credit: Martin Cohen, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: Performances of two ancient ceremonies from southern Malaita in the Solomon Islands. Totora is a ceremony in which people can behave in ways not normally allowed. Siwa is a ceremony of revenge for a man’s death.
creator_credit_for_label: Martin Cohen, Don Murray and Film Australia
